export var questionObj={"Qtext":"
If it is given that \((8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 ):(xy ) = -54 : 1 \). Find the ratio of \(x : y \).
\newline
","Steps":[{"id":"s1","n_params":0,"step_txt":"It is given that 
\[
	(8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 ):(xy ) = -54 : 1 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 }{xy } = \frac{-54}{1}
\]"},{"id":"s2","n_params":0,"step_txt":"
\[
	8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 = -54 xy 
\]"},{"id":"s3","n_params":0,"step_txt":"
\[
	\Rightarrow 8 x ^2 - (-54 )xy - 14 y ^2 = 0
\]"},{"id":"s4","n_params":0,"step_txt":"
\[
	\Rightarrow 8 x ^2 + 54xy - 14 y ^2 = 0
\]"},{"id":"s5","n_params":0,"step_txt":"
\[
	\Rightarrow 8 x ^2 + 56 xy - 2 xy - 14 y ^2 = 0
\]"},{"id":"s6","n_params":0,"step_txt":"
\[
	\Rightarrow 8x (1x + 7y) - 2y (1x + 7y) = 0
\]"},{"id":"s7","n_params":0,"step_txt":"
\[
	\Rightarrow (1 x + 7 y )(8 x - 2 y ) = 0
\]"},{"id":"s8","n_params":0,"step_txt":"
\[
	\Rightarrow (1 x + 7 y ) = 0 \text{ or} (8 x - 2 y ) = 0
\]"},{"id":"s9","n_params":0,"step_txt":"

\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{x }{y } = \frac{-7 }{1 }
\]
Or, 
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{x }{y } = \frac{2 }{8 }
\]
\newline
"}]};export var resp=[{"data":[],"text":"$$\text{The expression $ (8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 ):(xy ) = -54 : 1 $ can be written as $ frac{8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 }{xy } = \frac{-54}{1} $}.$$"},{"data":[],"text":"$$\text{Upon cross_multiplication and simplification we get $ 8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 = -54 xy $}$$"},{"data":[],"text":"$$\text{Bringing all the terms on the left hand side we get $ 8 x ^2 - (-54 )xy - 14 y ^2 = 0 $.}$$"},{"data":[],"text":"$$\text{$ 8 x ^2 + 54xy - 14 y ^2 = 0 $}$$ "},{"data":[],"text":"$$\text{$ 8 x ^2 + 56 xy - 2 xy - 14 y ^2 = 0 $}$$ "},{"data":[],"text":"$$\text{$ 8x (1x + 7y) - 2y (1x + 7y) = 0 $}$$ "},{"data":[],"text":"$$\text{$ (1 x + 7 y )(8 x - 2 y ) = 0 $}$$ "},{"data":[],"text":"$$\text{$ (1 x + 7 y ) = 0 \text{ or} (8 x - 2 y ) = 0 $}$$ "},{"data":[],"text":" "}];

sourcesContent:
export const questionObj = {"Qtext": "
If it is given that \((8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 ):(xy ) = -54 : 1 \). Find the ratio of \(x : y \).
\newline
", "Steps": [{"id": "s1", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "It is given that 
\[
	(8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 ):(xy ) = -54 : 1 
\]
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 }{xy } = \frac{-54}{1}
\]"}, {"id": "s2", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 = -54 xy 
\]"}, {"id": "s3", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 8 x ^2 - (-54 )xy - 14 y ^2 = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s4", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 8 x ^2 + 54xy - 14 y ^2 = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s5", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 8 x ^2 + 56 xy - 2 xy - 14 y ^2 = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s6", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow 8x (1x + 7y) - 2y (1x + 7y) = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s7", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow (1 x + 7 y )(8 x - 2 y ) = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s8", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "
\[
	\Rightarrow (1 x + 7 y ) = 0 \text{ or} (8 x - 2 y ) = 0
\]"}, {"id": "s9", "n_params": 0, "step_txt": "

\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{x }{y } = \frac{-7 }{1 }
\]
Or, 
\[
	\Rightarrow \frac{x }{y } = \frac{2 }{8 }
\]
\newline
"}]} 

 export const resp = [{"data": [], "text": "$$\text{The expression $ (8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 ):(xy ) = -54 : 1 $ can be written as $ frac{8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 }{xy } = \frac{-54}{1} $}.$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Upon cross_multiplication and simplification we get $ 8 x ^2 - 14 y ^2 = -54 xy $}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{Bringing all the terms on the left hand side we get $ 8 x ^2 - (-54 )xy - 14 y ^2 = 0 $.}$$"}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{$ 8 x ^2 + 54xy - 14 y ^2 = 0 $}$$ "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{$ 8 x ^2 + 56 xy - 2 xy - 14 y ^2 = 0 $}$$ "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{$ 8x (1x + 7y) - 2y (1x + 7y) = 0 $}$$ "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{$ (1 x + 7 y )(8 x - 2 y ) = 0 $}$$ "}, {"data": [], "text": "$$\text{$ (1 x + 7 y ) = 0 \text{ or} (8 x - 2 y ) = 0 $}$$ "}, {"data": [], "text": " "}]
